subtitleNullable: Predict Rainfall in Australia - latest data
descriptionNullable:
### Context

I was working on a project related to COVID-19 and Weather in Australia. Hence thought of uploading it as it may benefits others.


### Content

This dataset contains daily weather observations from numerous Australian weather stations.

The target variable RainTomorrow means: Did it rain the next day? Yes or No.

You can also this data as binary classification model or regression model.


### Acknowledgements

Observations were drawn from numerous weather stations. The daily observations are available from http://www.bom.gov.au/climate/data. Copyright Commonwealth of Australia 2010, Bureau of Meteorology.

Definitions adapted from http://www.bom.gov.au/climate/dwo/IDCJDW0000.shtml

### Inspiration

Inspiration came from Rattle Package as mentioned in the link.
https://www.kaggle.com/jsphyg/weather-dataset-rattle-package
